description:
Of the seven central ships in the 37th long-distance colonization fleet (http://anidb.net/ch49377 [Einstein] Research Experimental Ship, http://anidb.net/ch49408 [Hollywood] Amusement Ship, http://anidb.net/ch49351 [Mark Twain] Resort Ship, http://anidb.net/ch49262 [Riviera] Resort Ship, http://anidb.net/ch49273 [Sunny Flower] Agricultural Ship, and http://anidb.net/ch49341 [Three Star] Factory Ship) the West Point Class Macro-Training Base Ship is the only military vessel of the group. As the name implies, the West Point Class is a training ship and is equipped with numerous military facilities such as flight simulators for pilot training. In addition to training, the Begin Hill acts as a frontline command center for the fleet (in the absence of the http://anidb.net/ch49255 [Macross 7]) and also supports the fleet by replenishing supplies and developing weapons.
Source: http://www.macross2.net/m3/macross7/westpointclass.htm
name: Begin Hill
